channel.title: bash on Alfred Nutile
channel.description: Recent content in bash on Alfred Nutile

description.p: This simple command "history" shows a numbered list of your past commands.

blockquote.p:
1720 sudo chgrp -R www-data batch
1721 sudo chmod -R 766 batch
1722 ls -al
1723 sudo chmod -R 776 batch
1724 cd batch/full/
1725 pwd
1726 exit
1727 mv build.xml.ant /var/www/test/site/sites/default/files/behat_yml/batch/full/
1728 cd /var/www/test/site/sites/default/files/behat_yml/batch/full/

description.p: From there you can choose a number from the output and run
